entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 23.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of light snow beginning late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 42 this morning and minus 32 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Tuesday 07 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 17 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Temperature rising to minus 17 by morning. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Tuesday 07 March 2023
